segments.text: I can’t believe how calm the woman looks while everything is falling apart around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the sink, and she doesn’t even blink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is about to fall off that stool, and she’s just drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie like it’s the most natural thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman is just ignoring everything on purpose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to collapse any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t watch this anymore; it’s making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching for those cookies like they’re worth the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is going to have a big mess to clean up soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
